channel.title: Assassin ventilator
channel.description:
Hi, I found this bug in this map:
bm_c1a4c (Blast Pit chapter)
When I turn on the ventilator I can't climb the ladders. If I do this, I die instantly.
Is this a bug or I must run to the ladders? I dunno.. :/
Thanks!

item.title: Assassin ventilator
item.dc:creator: Alaiskai
item.description:
Thanks!

I’m totally agree with you… I’ve died a lot of times and now I know what I must to do

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin ventilator
item.dc:creator: Vinylshadow
item.description:
Yeah, that part of the game makes absolutely no sense

“Let’s put the switches UNDER the fan, then have the fan move at speeds that are impossible to get by unless you either haul your armored behind after flipping the switch or noclip”

But yeah, you have to run for the ladder

Read full topic
